about_the_game:
Zombie Carnage 2 is a 32 player first person shooter where you will play both as a human and zombie. By killing zombies and infecting humans you will permanently level up, unlock weapons, attachments, zombie classes and more.

Extreme replayability.

More than 7 game modes featured. As a competitive multiplayer with MMO style progression, sky's the limit.

Dozens of weapons. Dozens of attachments.

As you level up, you will unlock new weapons. By using them you will be able to unlock attachments, such as sights, suppressors, compensators, grips, extended mags, different ammo types, stocks and more to customize each weapon to your style.

Sharpen your claws. Find some brains.

When you get infected, you will play as a zombie. Choose among many zombie classes, each with their own strengths and weaknesses

Highly optimized.

Zombie Carnage 2 is a competitive game and we want everybody to be able to enjoy it. You can expect great performance regardless of your PC. The minimum system requirements are needed in order to launch the game.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes killing of humans and zombies or other monsters, blood and gore.

detailed_description:
Zombie Carnage 2 is a 32 player first person shooter where you will play both as a human and zombie. By killing zombies and infecting humans you will permanently level up, unlock weapons, attachments, zombie classes and more.

Extreme replayability.

More than 7 game modes featured. As a competitive multiplayer with MMO style progression, sky's the limit.

Dozens of weapons. Dozens of attachments.

As you level up, you will unlock new weapons. By using them you will be able to unlock attachments, such as sights, suppressors, compensators, grips, extended mags, different ammo types, stocks and more to customize each weapon to your style.

Sharpen your claws. Find some brains.

When you get infected, you will play as a zombie. Choose among many zombie classes, each with their own strengths and weaknesses

Highly optimized.

Zombie Carnage 2 is a competitive game and we want everybody to be able to enjoy it. You can expect great performance regardless of your PC. The minimum system requirements are needed in order to launch the game.
name: Zombie Carnage 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer, 64 bits
  • Processor: Dual Core 64 bits
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 400 series, Radeon HD 5000 series, Intel 3rd gen CPUs
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game requires at least DirectX 11 (feature level 11_0) to run
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bits
  • Processor: Quad Core 64 bits
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1050Ti, AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Zombie Carnage 2 is a 32 player first person shooter where you will play both as a human and zombie. By killing zombies and infecting humans you will permanently level up, unlock weapons, attachments, zombie classes and more.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
